channel.title: Classification on Heramb Dharmadhikari
channel.description: Recent content in Classification on Heramb Dharmadhikari

item.title: Detecting wether the image is a image of cretor or not
item.description: I am a person who is always attracted to space. To apply and improve my knowledge of Data Science and apply it in a real-world scenario, I stared with this project. I have created this project to gain knowledge about how images are classified using machine learning algorithms. What were some challenges are faced and how did I solve that with help of different techniques. Let us discuss that. About the Dataset- This dataset was generated using HRSC nadir panchromatic image h0905_0000 taken by the Mars Express spacecraft.
